string.text: {MODULE} is loaded before the {REQUIRED_MODULE}!{NL}Make sure {MODULE} is loaded after it!
{MODULE} is loaded after the {REQUIRED_MODULE}!{NL}Make sure {MODULE} is loaded before it!
{MODULE} has mutually exclusive mod order directives specified for the {REQUIRED_MODULE}!
It's strongly recommended to terminate the game now. Do you wish to terminate it?
Stops the Exception Handler when a debugger is attached.
Catch every Native->Managed call. Should catch every exception not catched the standard way. Might decrease the overall performance a bit.
Disables ButterLib's and BEW's Crash Handlers with the new Watchdog Crash Handler. Do not enable if not sure.
Mod Developer feature! Provides helpers to calculate distance between objects on map.
Mod Developer feature! Provides a better way for mods to create hotkeys
Mod Developer feature! Introduces a MBSubModuleBase-derived abstract class, that provides new SubModule events.

Extends and fixes the game's save system:{NL}* Fixes possible collision with save names;{NL}* Fixes save corruption & crashes when duplicate types are defined;{NL}* Adds support for saving many more container types;{NL}This might alter the save file, disabling the feature might render the save file unloadable!
Uploads the crash reports to BUTR for an easy file hosting.
Mod Developer feature! Provides helpers to run methods after SubModule events.
Captures game crashes and creates reports out of them.
Mod Developer feature! A wrapper for MBSubModuleBase based on Harmony patches.
